name: Hallows Survival
description:
A rough demo for Hallows Survival,  A horror survival game based on the click to move genre.

The key aim of the game is to ensure all lights remain lit and to wipe out all the enemy's that spawn within the timeframe.

Game features planned for inclusion:

  • Classic gameplay movement style
  • Useful weapon and power up drops
    • Health boost power up
    • Invincibility pellet (grants invincibility against enemy's for a set time dependent on the rarity of the drop)
  • Candle lighting system to increase difficulty of playthrough.
    • Four candles are placed in each corner of the map with a set time they will burn for, the player must ensure that three or more of the candles are lit at the same time by re-lighting each as they go out. If the candles go out the level will end and the player will have to start again.

Assets

Pumpkin basket

Baskets are dropped by some mobs when they are killed and will provide the player with different useful powerups for use throughout the level.

Some modelled characters, ghosts will be the primary opposition throughout the game and will spawn in groups around grace sites.

The pumpkin character is the primary protagonist throughout and will be the primary character used by the player.
